meanings.definition: Not made known to the public.
meanings.sent1: The secret party was unpublicized, so only a few people knew about it.
meanings.sent2: The unpublicized event was a small gathering of friends.
meanings.sent3: The unpublicized surprise gift made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her unpublicized talent for painting amazed her friends.
meanings.sent5: The unpublicized treasure hunt was full of hidden surprises.

meanings.sent1: The unpublicized movie premiere had a limited audience.
meanings.sent2: The unpublicized sale attracted only a few customers.
meanings.sent3: The unpublicized celebrity sighting caused a small commotion.
meanings.sent4: His unpublicized invention revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent5: The unpublicized book signing went unnoticed by many.
